body: This was a flawless victory for me. His male characters always look like I feel when I get toyed in the same fashion. :) The stories are usually twisted but not over-the-top, a sort of middle-ground between vanilla and guro in the kink spectrum.  To me this indicates mental health and a well-adjusted psyche in both him and you guys as well. Kinky thoughts are essentially reproductive urges hard-coded into us via evolution finding a creative means to express themselves within modern cultural contexts- and are stronger when a person isn't getting as much action as they desire. After fathering a child, one's testosterone levels go down which makes a guy (or girl) less kinky and horny. yes, woman have testosterone too- just less.
I dont know why but when i started reading i couldnt stop. Im in love artist.
You ever just start reading something and you know what's coming, but dreadful curiosity pulls you in?
Great art as always from Dhibi sensei. The slime girl turned out to be sich a nice person. Good twist!

Yes that how you got to fuck a girl girl you wanted
I like the slim girl
I have to say this the best manga artwork I have seen. I enjoy the character design, and how beautiful the women look. It's redefine in a way that it shows in a artistic beauty.

That was...unexpected. She was so nice to them...I think this is the first time I've ever seen something like this where the controlling party noticed the girl was a virgin and went "ah, let's fix that...with your boyfriends dick!"
don't know why, but I'm mesmerized by the art style
Now that i'm finished i'm asking myself... what is wrong with me?
